Name: Cantina Caliente

Name: Cantina Caliente
Review Text:

The staff is very helpful and welcoming. I loved it! And I will return again soon.

Name: Cantina Caliente
Review Text: One of the waitress accidentally split the beer on me wet my hoodie and my pants which is fine accident happens. However, I asked the one who came and settle the bill to remove it since I barely drank that bottle. She refused and said ‚Äúyour friend is already paying‚Äù Which was like ‚Ä¶ what?? Also food was way overpriced for what it was.

Name: Cantina Caliente
Review Text: Probably the best South American food I've had outside South America. The taco plate is absolutely delicious. The pork ribs are exceptional and there own beer on draft is high 8.1% butt addictive. I encourage you to try everything on there menu and beyond. You will have a feast in your belly and mouth.

Review Text: This was awesome!! What a night. We asked the chef to choose our dishes. Please feed us untill we yell STOP! Definetly coming back here many times more...
